markdownRemark.html:
Starhopper successfully did 150 meters flight vertically and returned to the ground in 57 seconds!


Just a quick blog about Elon, using my lunch time to make draft blogs is in-operable as of late because of the need of me to concentrate on solving some problems at my work in Cayman Islands.

Back to Elon… I’ve followed him for years now and always waiting for his September event yearly (often times exactly at my birthday) to see what cool stuff he have came up…that was before a lot of the newer Neuralink, Boring Company and Starlink. I try to model his way of thinking a lot but yeah it is rather hard to mimic someone who I believe to have a genetic mutation.

I wish to work for this guy in the future, the future where he is converging humanity to reach for the stars..
